item.title: Formula 1: An alternative view to ‘Pedal to the Vettel'
item.author: Joseph Taylor,
item.description: Having read the Formula 1 review in Issue 1474, I found several points I completely disagree with. Firstly, team orders. I believe that Ferrari were completely correct to ask Massa to move over and allow Alonso through. At that point in the season, both drivers were a long way behind the Red Bulls …
